Package com.redis.riot.file.xml

Class XmlResourceItemWriterBuilder<T>

java.lang.Object
com.redis.riot.file.xml.XmlResourceItemWriterBuilder<T>
Type Parameters:
T - type of objects to write as XML output.
public class XmlResourceItemWriterBuilder<T> extends Object
Builder for XmlResourceItemWriter.
